A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made an account just to tell you how RIAN JOHNSON ruined my second favorite character\, LUKE SKYWALKER.\n\nLuke was not a murderer. On the DEATHSTAR he learned the lesson of rage when he almost struck down THE EMPEROR. He would NEVER again go to BEN SOLO's home like MACE WINDU with an extended saber looking for a kill. Screw you RIAN JOHNSON. I trusted you based on your BREAKING BAD episodes but what you did to LUKE is sickening.
